title: The first general epistle of St. John the Apostle, unfolded & applied. The second part, in thirty and seven lectures on the second chapter, from the third to the last verse. Delivered in St. Dionys. Back-Church, by Nath: Hardy minister of the gospel, and preacher to that parish.
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: printed for Joseph Cranford, and are to bee sold at his shop at the Castle and Lion, in St. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Includes index and 3 leaves of advertisements.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
